reviewtext: A top quality product, but maybe not for a novice or occasional user. I got this for my wife as a Christmas gift as she was wanting to be able to see the "critters" in the woods on our property better. They do a good job, but the process of getting them set up and focused for a certain individual is rather tedious and hard to remember. It's a bit of a pain to have to read instructions every time you want to look at something because use is infrequent. I would recommend them, but only for a regular, experienced user.
